title: Development of Instructional Design Strategies for ChatGPT Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and science education experience
context.additional_context: Multilayered perception analysis and application of ChatGPT utilization strategies in science education design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ChatGPT integration perceptions by instructional designer types using Q methodology
Learners can propose at least three content generation strategies using ChatGPT for science curriculum design
Learners can identify limitations and propose solutions when utilizing ChatGPT through project-based assessments

resources: Instructional Design Case Materials in Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
